part.content: CHAPTER I : OF EASEMENTS GENERALLY. Sec. 4 - 7.
CHAPTER II : THE IMPOSITION, ACQUISITION AND TRANSFER OF EASEMENTS. Sec. 8 - 19.
CHAPTER III : THE INCIDENTS OF EASEMENTS. Sec. 20 - 31.
CHAPTER IV : THE DISTURBANCE OF EASEMENTS. Sec. 32 - 36.
CHAPTER V : THE EXTINCTION, SUSPENSION AND REVIVAL OF EASEMENTS. Sec. 37 - 51.
